title: Cards have sold - Higher grade T205's

posts.post_title: Cards have sold - Higher grade T205's
posts.post_content:
Cards have $OLD - A few higher graded T205's, please message if interested, prices include postage.  Thanks for looking.  NC residents add 6.5% ST.  

T205 William "Kitty" Bransfield Sweet Caporal - SGC 4.5 

T205 George Paskert Piedmont - SGC 5  

T205 Patrick Moran (No Stray Line) Sweet Caporal Red - SGC 4.5

T205 Harry Krause Piedmont - SGC 5 

T205 Danny Murphy Hassan - SGC 5
bump for third and last reduction.
